_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The training that SƒÅriputta should unde: No ego, possessiveness, or underlying tendency to conceit for this conscious body
No ego, possessiveness, or underlying tendency to conceit for all external stimuli
Live having achieved the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where ego, possessiveness, and underlying tendency to conceit are no more
The qualities of a mendicant who has cut: No ego, possessiveness, or underlying tendency to conceit for this conscious body
No ego, possessiveness, or underlying tendency to conceit for all external stimuli
Live having attained the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where ego, possessiveness, and underlying tendency to conceit are no more
The components of liberation by enlighte: Giving up both sensual desires and aversion
